backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder for backend canister.
feature_evidence.json: Report documenting feature implementation and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color system, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry for the main SPA that loads the React app.
frontend/public/coupon/index.html: Standalone HTML entry enabling direct navigation to the /coupon route.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with landing and coupon routes wrapped in CopyProvider.
frontend/src/components/CouponCard.tsx: Renders a decorative Valentine coupon card using themed UI components and copy context values.
frontend/src/components/EditTextPanel.ts: Modal editor allowing users to update landing and coupon text fields with save, cancel, and reset actions.
frontend/src/content/CopyContext.tsx: React context managing editable copy state, draft edits, persistence, and editâ€‘mode control.
frontend/src/content/defaultCopy.ts: Defines AppCopy interface and provides default text values for landing and coupon sections.
frontend/src/content/storage.ts: LocalStorage helpers for loading, saving, clearing, and initializing copy data with validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder module indicating no backend queries are needed for this static app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom CSS variables, and Valentine-themed light/dark styles plus animations and component utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/CouponPage.tsx: Renders the coupon screen with decorative visuals, navigation controls, an editable coupon card, and themed footer.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineLanding.tsx: Implements the landing page with background imagery, editable Valentine text, CTA navigation, decorative hearts, and themed footer.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color variables, animations, shadows, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including summary, issues, features, and architectural notes for build and development tracking.
